SfxIdOnMap.Wiki: Sfx that appears when a Resource Item is placed in a map

SfxIdFlying.Wiki: Sfx when Resource Item is travelling towards you

SfxIdOnHit.Wiki: Sfx spawned when Resource Item hits the player

ActionUnlockType.Wiki: Prevents this Resource Item from being obtained until this Action is unlocked in ActionUnlockParam

GetVelocityMin.Wiki: Set the minimum initial velocity of the flying object. The initial speed is randomly determined between the minimum and maximum initial speeds.

GetVelocityMax.Wiki: Set the maximum initial velocity of the flying object. The initial speed is randomly determined between the minimum and maximum initial speeds.

GetMaxSpeed.Wiki: Set the maximum speed when flying. Even if you accelerate, the speed will not exceed this speed.

GetTimeoutTime.Wiki: Even if the flying item does not reach the player, it will be forcibly retrieved after this time has elapsed.

Self.Wiki: Defines Resource Items, aka Spirit Emblems/Regenerative Power Fragments
